description.full: Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Step inside the most richly detailed and vibrant game-world ever created. Oblivion is the latest chapter in the epic Elder Scrolls saga. With a powerful combination of freeform gameplay and unprecedented graphics, you can unravel the main quest at your own pace or explore the vast world and find your own challenges. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
